channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sequoia bets on silence
item.description: There is a time-honored crisis management strategy, wherein one says nothing and waits for the outrage to pass. For Sequoia Capital, the strategy work...

item.title: OpenAI delays the release of its open model, again
item.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said Friday the company is delaying the release of its open model indefinitely.

item.title: 14 Best Prime Day TV Deals for All Budgets (2025)
item.description: These are the best TV deals to shop during Amazon's Prime Day sale event.

item.title: The 6 Best Prime Day Action Camera Deals for Thrill Seekers (2025)
item.description: Action cameras are perfect for travel, social media vlogging, and careening around the lake on a jet ski. Upgrade your action camera with one of these...

item.title: 20 Best Prime Day Fitness Tracker Deals and Smart Ring Sales (2025)
item.description: It’s summer and we’re ready to run around like crazy. These deals on fitness trackers and smart rings—like the Oura Ring—will help you do that.

item.title: Best Prime Day Laptop Deals 2025: MacBooks, Chromebooks, and More
item.description: We’ve tested just about every laptop you’d want to buy, and these are the best deals we’ve found for Amazon Prime Day.

item.title: Windsurf’s CEO goes to Google; OpenAI’s acquisition falls apart
item.description: Notably, Google is not taking a stake in Windsurf and will not have any control over the company.

item.title: Can an ‘ethical’ spyware maker justify providing its tech to ICE?
item.description: Analysis: In calling itself an ethical spyware vendor, Paragon has opened itself up to scrutiny of its government customers.

item.title: Firefly Aerospace files for an IPO
item.description: Firefly is heading into the initial public offering with $176.9 million in cash and cash equivalents. And while it has incurred negative cash flows an...

item.title: The 22 Best Non–Prime Day Deals From Retailers That Are Not Amazon
item.description: Amazon doesn’t have a monopoly on deals. Forget Prime Day with tempting tech deals from Walmart, Target, and other retailers.
